item.title: Neptunia Riders VS Dogoos coming to PC in 2025
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2025/01/neptunia-riders-vs-dogoos-coming-to-pc-in-2025

  • PC

PlayStation and Switch versions due out on January 28 in the west.

Publisher Idea Factory International and developer Compile Heart will release Neptunia Riders VS Dogoos for PC via Steam in 2025, the companies announced.

Neptunia Riders VS Dogoos first launched for PlayStation 5, PlayStation 4, and witch on June 27, 2024 in Japan, and is due out for those platforms on January 28 in the west.

Here is an overview of the game, via Idea Factory International:

About

This dimension is different from Gamindustri…

A vast number of distinct Dogoos are appearing and threatening to cover the land.

To escape from this otherworldly realm, a lone rider surveys the mysterious world in search of an exit.

Key Features

  • Dogoo Day Care – Choose from six playable characters, scour the land on your trusty bike, and collect as many variants of Dogoos as possible to win! As players progress through 15 Dogoo-filled stages, Uzume must find a way to snap her friends out of their weird fascination with Dogoos!
  • The Dogoo Bounty Hunter – Collecting Dogoos can be a cinch, but stealing Dogoos is a whole ‘notha ball game! Certain characters shine more in close combat, while others excel in long-range attacks. Find the strengths (and weaknesses, of course!) to become a true Dogoo bounty hunter!
  • These Dogoos Do Bike Back – As squishy and adorable as these Dogoos are, some can be quite the menace. Each Dogoo has specific types of behaviors, as well as positive/negative effects when collecting them. By learning the positive and negative effects of the Dogoos, you can use them to your advantage and even throw the nasty ones to your opponent!
  • Stunt Your Bike – Want to show off your ride in the next bike meet? Impress (or scare?) Dogoos by altering the bike’s body, muffler, tires, and other accessories! These customizations can give the Goddesses increased defense, max speed, acceleration, and even maneuverability. These upgrades can ultimately give you the winning edge!

Watch a new trailer below.

PC Announce Trailer

item.title: EVERSPACE 2 DLC ‘Wrath of the Ancients’ announced
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2025/01/everspace-2-dlc-wrath-of-the-ancients-announced

  • PC
  • PS5
  • Xbox Series

Due out this spring.

ROCKFISH Games has announced EVERSPACE 2 downloadable content “Wrath of the Ancients.” It will launch for all available platforms this spring.

“Our community keeps asking when they can finally explore Aethon and the answer is soon!” said ROCKFISH Games CEO and co-founder Michael Schade in a press release. “EVERSPACE 2: Wrath of the Ancients massively expands the universe of the EVERSPACE series, giving pilots more star systems to explore, more enemies to battle, and a new ship that changes the game. Players who want to discover more of Cluster 34 have a lot to look forward to. Over the coming months, we’ll be sharing all kinds of reveals for Wrath of the Ancients on our social channels and streams. Stay tuned space pilots!”

  • ❮
  • ❯

Here is an overview of the downloadable content, via ROCKFISH Games:

“Wrath of the Ancients” continues the EVERSPACE 2 story, adding new star systems to explore and expanding existing star systems with new side quests.

Players will be able to pilot a new ship to battle against alien enemies and ancient threats in an all-new story set after the events of EVERSPACE 2. Mysterious attacks have laid waste to human settlements in Cluster 34, destabilizing factions in power and stranding survivors. With this destruction, the uneasy peace between humankind and Okkar is threatened—space pilots will venture into the Okkar Homeworlds to discover the truth behind the threat before war reignites the DMZ.

During the events of Wrath of the Ancients, warp gates open to four new fully explorable star systems including the Okkar homeworlds and Aethon, adding even more secrets throughout Cluster 34. These new star systems will be packed with new enemies, weapons, and gear to discover.

EVERSPACE 2 is available now for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, and PC via Steam, GOG, and Microsoft Store.

Watch the “Wrath of the Ancients” announcement trailer below. View a set of screenshots at the gallery.

DLC “Wrath of the Ancients” Announce Trailer
